notesStmt.note: Beginning of Mishnah is identified מתני׳ in enlarged squared characters; text breaks denoted by a sof pasuḳ plus 1-2 spaces; markings in upper corner of recto may indicate that this was the first fol. in a fascicle; A fragment from Bava batra chapter IX, parallel to, in the common, Vilna edition, 67b l. 39 בין שמת ארוס to 68a l. 37 אין אלו נגבין (end of Mishnah).
Condition: nearly complete; possibly cropped in interior margin; blurred.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msContents.textLang: Hebrew; Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE)

msItem.title: Halakhot, Bava batra, pars 895-897
msItem.author: יצחק בן יעקב, אלפסי, 1013-1103 Yizhaq ben Yaaqov, al-Fasi, 1013-1103 Alfasi, Isaac ben Jacob, 1013-1103 Yizhaq ben Yaaqov 1013-1103 al-Fasi Yiẓḥaq ʾAlfasī, 1013-1103 Isaac ben Jacob Alfasi 1013-1103 Alfasî, Yiṣḥāq Ben-Yaʿaqov 1013-1103 Alfassi, Isaac ben Jacob, 1013-1103 Alfasi, Icchak ben Jaakow ha-Kohen (1013-1103) إسحاق الفاسي Jicchak ben Ja'akov al-Fasi, 1013-1103

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 19 (recto), 17 (verso); ruling method: left rule occasionally justified by upward slanting the exceeding word.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
